item.title: DEFACTINIB
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db12282
DrugCentral: defactinib
Synonymous : None


Drug Sentece Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of defactinib gene in 3 abstracts.

pmid sentence
30527180 Three inhibitors were more efficient than cisplatin, the drug used as first-line chemotherapy in patients with MPM: verteporfin, a putative YAP inhibitor, defactinib, a FAK inhibitor and NSC668394, an Ezrin inhibitor.
30785827 On this basis, we designed a randomized, phase II trial to investigate whether defactinib as maintenance therapy after standard first-line chemotherapy could improve progression-free survival (PFS) in patients with malignant pleural mesothelioma (MPM). […] Patients were stratified for merlin and then randomly assigned (in a 1:1 fashion) to receive either oral defactinib or placebo until disease progression, unacceptable toxicity, or withdrawal occurred. […] Three hundred forty-four patients were randomly assigned to receive either defactinib (n = 173) or placebo (n = 171). […] The median PFS was 4.1 months (95% CI, 2.9 to 5.6 months) for defactinib versus 4.0 months (95% CI, 2.9 to 4.2 months) for placebo. […] The median OS was 12.7 months (95% CI, 9.1 to 21 months) for defactinib versus 13.6 months (95% CI, 9.6 to 21.2 months) for placebo (hazard ratio, 1.0; 95% CI, 0.7 to 1.4). […] Although shorter survival for both defactinib- and placebo-treated patients was observed, in the patients who had merlin-low MPM compared with the patients who had merlin-high MPM, there were no statistical differences in response rate, PFS, OS, or QoL between the treatment groups. […] Neither PFS nor OS was improved by defactinib after first-line chemotherapy in patients with merlin-low MPM. […] Defactinib cannot be recommended as maintenance therapy for advanced MPM.
